artist: Illustrator: Nelson Howe; Author: Poem by Keith Waldrop; Publisher: George Wittenborn, Inc., New York
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: softcover book with 14 illustrations; removable gray paper cover with paper label on front with grid and text; booklet with text included in collage-like images printed in black, white and red; 40 pp.
medium: Color letterpress printed from copper plates; bound volume
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2017.
signed: Signed by the artist and author on colophon page, in black: Nelson Howe | on colophon page, in red: Keith Waldrop
title: To the Sincere Reader
